00021 #include <cppunit/CompilerOutputter.h>
00022 #include <cppunit/extensions/TestFactoryRegistry.h>
00023 #include <cppunit/ui/text/TestRunner.h>
00024 
00025 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00026 {
00027         // Get the top level suite from the registry
00028         CPPUNIT_NS::Test *suite = CPPUNIT_NS::TestFactoryRegistry::getRegistry().makeTest();
00029 
00030         // Adds the test to the list of test to run
00031         CPPUNIT_NS::TextUi::TestRunner runner;
00032         runner.addTest( suite );
00033 
00034         // Change the default outputter to a compiler error format outputter
00035         runner.setOutputter( new CPPUNIT_NS::CompilerOutputter( &runner.result(), std::cerr ) );
00036         // Run the test.
00037         bool wasSucessful = runner.run();
00038 
00039         // Return error code 1 if the one of test failed.
00040         return wasSucessful ? 0 : 1;
00041 }
